What you will work on

  • Ship UI components and flows in Canva’s editor/growth surfaces.
  • Improve performance, accessibility, and experimentation setups.
  • Collaborate with designers/PMs on rapid iterations.

What makes you a fit

  1. Solid JS/TS fundamentals and React experience.
  2. Component-driven mindset with testing discipline.
  3. Comfortable with async communication in a distributed team.

Interview stages

  • Recruiter screen.
  • Technical round (DSA + frontend exercise).
  • System/design discussion with engineers.
  • Team fit; offer with stipend details.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 12 March 2026.
